name: Vegan Mozzarella Cheese with Tomatoes (Caprese)
description: I'm so excited about this vegan mozzarella! The recipe is super simple and you only need four very healthy ingredients. It's best served in a caprese salad!
recipeIngredient: 1/2  cup + 1 tablespoon unsweetened plant-based milk (soy, almond, or oat)
4  large tomatoes, cut into thin slices

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients into a high speed blender and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients into a high speed blender and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the mixture to a small round bowl and let it sit in the fridge for about 4 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the mixture to a small round bowl and let it sit in the fridge for about 4 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the vegan mozzarella into thin slices and serve it with tomatoes, fresh basil, minced garlic, and balsamic vinegar.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the vegan mozzarella into thin slices and serve it with tomatoes, fresh basil, minced garlic, and balsamic vinegar.
